pullRequest.title: [DROOLS-5367] Avoid needs of kmodule.xml during kiepmmlmodel generation/instantiation
pullRequest.bodyText:
@danielezonca @mariofusco @jiripetrlik
See https://issues.redhat.com/browse/DROOLS-5367
This PR

Implement a "PMMLRuntimeFactory" that completely by-pass usage of kmodule.xml
Implement a common "AbstractPMMLTest" class to put all duplicated code in one single place - making use of the newly created PMMLRuntimeFactory
refactor all integration tests, removing kmodule.xml and extending AbstractPMMLTest

Depends on
kiegroup/droolsjbpm-build-bootstrap#1474

commit.message: [DROOLS-5367] Implemented common AbstractPMMLTest to be extended by all PMML integration tests. Refactored PMML integration tests. Removed all kmodule.xml

nodes.bodyText: One question. It seems that "kie-pmml-models-tests" is an util module for all other tests. Does it make sense to put its abstract classes to "test" folder? I think it would be much easier to put these utils into main folder. We can avoid of usage of classifiers etc. I expect there will be no functionality for users in this module.

commit.message: [DROOLS-5367] Moved AbstractPMMLTest to java directory. Refactored PMMLRuntimeFactory to accept a File as parameter
[DROOLS-5367] Implemented predictable PKGUUID. Moved common methods to org.drools.core.util.StringUtils
[DROOLS-5367] Add ReleaseId public getter to KnowledgeBuilderImpl
[DROOLS-5367] Defined PMMLRuleMapper/PMMLRuleMappers with codegen factories, templates and tests
[DROOLS-5367] Populating KnowledgeBuilderImpl with "Model" at load time
[DROOLS-5367] Implemented optional use of pre-generated PkgUUID

nodes.bodyText: Make the new field serializable adding it to readExternal/writeExternal methods.

commit.message: [DROOLS-5367] Minor fixes for Kogito integration. Add tests

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into DROOLS-5367

# Conflicts:
#	kie-pmml-trusty/kie-pmml-models/kie-pmml-models-mining/kie-pmml-models-mining-tests/src/test/java/org/kie/pmml/mining/tests/SegmentationMajorityVoteMiningTest.java

nodes.bodyText: Can you please add an assertion?
There are 2 <!-- EXTERNAL --> and btw what about add scope test to all the dependencies of this module?
What about a private static class instead of this method? Just to avoid to create an anonymous inner class for every test
This class should be moved to a more "public" module like some -api module. Wdyt?
